___________CREATING POLYGON\0D
\0D
Click to create each corner of the polygon, then choose Done from the menu to finish.__You can also press Esc or Ctrl-click to finish.\0D
\0D
To UNDO a corner, choose Undo.\0D
\0D
To change MAP displayed (visual or control), choose Map.\0D
\0D
To EXIT the Polygon Editor, choose eXit or press Ctrl-S.

_____________EDITING POLYGON\0D
\0D
To MOVE a corner, click on it and drag it to the new position.\0D
To INSERT a new corner, Ctrl-click to create it, then drag it to the correct position.\0D
To DELETE a corner, Shift-click on it.\0D
To UNDO an action, choose Undo from the menu.\0D
To CREATE a new polygon, choose Create.\0D
To change a polygon's TYPE (Total, Near or Barred), choose Type.\0D
To change MAP displayed (visual or control), choose Map.\0D
To EXIT the Polygon Editor, choose eXit or press Ctrl-S.\0D
\0D
In addition to using the mouse, you can use Space and BackSpace to select corners and Tab and BackTab to select polygons._

Click to where the top left of the window should be

Text Menu:

__Text - Change the text
__Font - Change the font of the text
__Just - Change justification mode
__Position - Change the position of the text
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu

Icon Menu:

__View - Change the view of the icon
__Loop - Change the loop of the icon
__Cel - Change the cel of the icon
__Position - Change the position of the icon
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu

Button Menu:

__Text - Change the button text
__Font - Change the font of the button text
__Value - Change the return value of the button
__Position - Change the position of the button
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu

Edit Menu:

__Font - Change the font of the edit text
__Length - Change the maximum length of input
__Position - Change the position of the edit
__Text - Change the default edit text
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu

Selector Menu:

__Width - Change the selector width (in chars)
__Length - Change number of selector lines
__Position - Change the position of the selector
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu

Main Menu:

__About - About the DialogEditor
__Item - Create a new item
__Edit - Edit properties of the current item
__Look - View properties of the current item
__Del - Delete the current item
__Win - Create a window background
__Help - You're here!
__eXit - Exit the DialogEditor (& maybe save)

Window Menu:

__Create - Draw the window to the correct size
__Position - Move the window and all items
__Delete - Remove the window
__Menu - Return to the Main Menu
